tool_description: Generates a Universal Unique Identifier v4 in plain text
name: UUID v4
title: UUID v4

api_list.name: /v4
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a **plain text string**  with a new Universal Unique Identifier, using version 4 (random).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uuid-v4.p.rapidapi.com/v4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uuid-v4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://uuid-v4.p.rapidapi.com/v4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uuid-v4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
